description: This puff pastry topped cauliflower cheese pie is creamy, crispy and comforting.
name: Cauliflower Cheese Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Place the milk in a large saucepan on medium heat with the onion, cloves and nutmeg and bring to a simmer. Remove from the heat and set aside to infuse for 10 minutes, strain and discard the onion and cloves.

Heat 4 tablespoons of butter in a large, deep pan on medium heat. Add the flour and cook for 2 minutes. Gradually add the milk, whisking to remove any lumps. Place back on the heat and bring to the boil. Cook for 5 minutes then whisk in the cheese and mustard powder.

Place the cauliflower in a pot of water, bring to the boil and cook for 3-4 minutes to soften slightly. Drain and tip the cauliflower into an ovenproof baking dish. Pour over the cheese sauce and mix well to coat the cauliflower.
Top the dish with the puff pastry, trimming off any excess. Brush with a tablespoon of melted butter and bake for 25-30 minutes until crisp and golden.
